name: .QGS
summary: Learn about .QGS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a QGS file with QGIS by selecting Project â†’ Open....

Since QGS files are saved in XML format, you can also open a QGS file with an XML or text editor to view the contents. Keep in mind that the contents will not appear the same as if they were being viewed with QGIS.
